org.svvrl.goal.core.repo
Class Repository

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.repo.Repository
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.ListModel
public class Repository
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.ListModel

This class defines a list model which can be used in a JList for further repository manipulation. There are also several static methods that can be used to manipulate the repository.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

openAsAutomaton

public static Automaton openAsAutomaton(Entry entry)
Opens the GFF file in a specified entry as an automaton object.

Parameters:
entry - an entry to be opened
Returns:
the automaton decoded from the GFF file in entry, or null if the GFF file in the entry cannot be opened or decoded
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the decoded object is not an automaton

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the directory cannot be created
